H0.text: Simon Legree is the villain in which famous novel. Bill Sikes

H1.text: Simon Legree is the villain in which famous novel. Professor Moriarty

H2.text: Simon Legree is the villain in which famous novel. Uriah Heep

H3.text: Simon Legree is the villain in which famous novel. Legree

A4.text: He is arguably the novel's main antagonist.

A5.text: The novel reveals that, as a young man, he had abandoned his sickly mother for a life at sea and ignored her letter to see her one last time at her deathbed.
